short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick capture of webpage elements, conversion to images, and automatic beautification.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ElemSnap is a tool for quickly capturing webpage elements and converting them into images.

Usage
1️⃣ Click the icon or use the shortcut (⌘ + ⇧ + X) to start
2️⃣ Slide the mouse to start capturing elements or press the button for scrolling screenshots

Features
🌀 Quickly capture elements and convert them into images
📷 Scrolling screenshots and full-screen screenshots are also available
📤 Drag, paste, or upload local images for beautification
🎑 Multiple beautiful gradient backgrounds to choose from
💈 Crop images again for further editing
💻 Accessibility-friendly, all operations can be completed through keyboard navigation
🔒 All operations are performed locally, no login required, protecting your privacy
...and more features are currently under development!

ElemSnap is developed and maintained by Ayden (https://twitter.com/AydenGen).

If you have any questions or feature suggestions, feel free to contact me at hi@elemsnap.com.
